headline.print_headline: Knicks’ Shooting Star Fizzles for a Night
headline.main: Knicks’ Shooting Star Fizzles for a Night

docs.snippet: Jeremy Lin struggled in Miami, making just 1 of 11 shots and finished with 8 turnovers, as the Knicks lost to the Heat and fell below .500 again in the final game before the All-Star break....
docs.abstract: Miami Heat defeat New York Knicks, 102-88, effectively shutting down Knicks star Jeremy Lin with an overwhelming defense; Lin has the worst performance since his first start, missing 10 of 11 shots and logging 8 turnovers.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin struggled in Miami, making just 1 of 11 shots and finished with 8 turnovers, as the Knicks lost to the Heat and fell below .500 again in the final game before the All-Star break.

docs.snippet: The behavior of the Americans who burned copies of the Koran in Afghanistan was shockingly insensitive. Though Afghans’ anger is understandable, there can be no justification for violent rampages....

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Editorial calls the behavior of American soldiers who burned copies of the Koran in Afghanistan 'shockingly insensitive'; understands Afghans' anger but holds there is no justification for violent rampages; urges Pres Hamid Karzai to remind Afghans of the huge sacrifices American forces have made fighting the horrors of Taliban repression.
docs.lead_paragraph: The behavior of the Americans who burned copies of the Koran in Afghanistan was shockingly insensitive. Though Afghans’ anger is understandable, there can be no justification for violent rampages.

headline.print_headline: Seven Marines Killed In Helicopter Collision
headline.main: Seven Marines Killed in Helicopter Collision

docs.snippet: The deaths came Wednesday night during training exercises in the desert along the California-Arizona border, the Marine Corps said on Thursday....

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Seven Marines are killed when two helicopters collide during training exercises in the desert along the California-Arizona border.

byline.contributor: James Dao contributed reporting from New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: The deaths came Wednesday night during training exercises in the desert along the California-Arizona border, the Marine Corps said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: For Two Catchers, Focus Is at the Plate, Not Behind It: Mets’ Nickeas Knows His Bat Holds the Key to His Future
headline.seo: A Mets Catcher Knows His Bat Holds the Key to His Future
headline.main: A Mets Catcher Knows His Bat Holds the Key to His Future

docs.snippet: Enterting spring training, Mike Nickeas is the slight favorite to back up Josh Thole this season but knows he won’t win the job if he hits .189 again....
docs.abstract: New York Mets catcher Mike Nickeas is entering spring training as the slight favorite to back up starter Josh Thole this season, but Nickeas knows he will need to improve his offense to win the job.
docs.lead_paragraph: Enterting spring training, Mike Nickeas is the slight favorite to back up Josh Thole this season but knows he won’t win the job if he hits .189 again.

headline.print_headline: Ex-KBR Chief Sentenced to 30 Months in Nigerian Bribery Case
headline.main: Ex-KBR Chief Sentenced to 30 Months in Nigerian Bribery Case

docs.snippet: Albert J. Stanley had pleaded guilty for taking part in a decade-long attempt to bribe Nigerian officials....
docs.abstract: Former KBR chief executive Albert J Stanley is sentenced to 30 months in prison for taking part in a decade-long attempt to bribe Nigerian officials to win $6 billion in contracts for a liquefied natural gas facility; former KBR consultant is also sentenced.
docs.lead_paragraph: Albert J. Stanley had pleaded guilty for taking part in a decade-long attempt to bribe Nigerian officials.

headline.seo: Man in Crash That Killed 6 Amish Farmers Pleads Guilty

docs.snippet: A western New York man has pleaded guilty to vehicular homicide and driving under the influence of drugs in a crash that killed six Amish farmers in July....
docs.abstract: Steven Eldridge pleads guilty to vehicular homicide in connection with a July crash in western New York State that killed six Amish farmers and injured eight others.
docs.lead_paragraph: A western New York man has pleaded guilty to vehicular homicide and driving under the influence of drugs in a crash that killed six Amish farmers in July.

docs.snippet: The people writing huge checks to “super PACs” will want to collect. And all but the most privileged Americans will pay the price if the nation’s wealthiest can buy elections....

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Editorial warns influence of donors who have written huge checks to 'super PACs' committed to defeating Pres Obama underscores the potential for corruption; notes Obama gave up the ability to campaign against the undue influence of special interests when he invited donors to give without limits to his re-election campaign; fears all but the most privileged Americans will pay the price if the nation's wealthiest can buy elections.
docs.lead_paragraph: The people writing huge checks to “super PACs” will want to collect. And all but the most privileged Americans will pay the price if the nation’s wealthiest can buy elections.

headline.print_headline: On Hollywood’s Night to Shine, Red Carpet Time For Ads, Too
headline.main: On Hollywood’s Night to Shine, Red Carpet Time for Ads, Too

docs.snippet: This year, the public may be more familiar with the brands sponsoring the Academy Awards than the movies vying for best picture....
docs.abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising highlights advertising scheduled to run during the 84th Academy Awards broadcast; notes some ads feature blue-chip brands.
docs.lead_paragraph: This year, the public may be more familiar with the brands sponsoring the Academy Awards than the movies vying for best picture.
